channel.title: blog on Kido Naoto
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Kido Naoto

item.title: I made this site with an awesome static site generator Hugo!
item.description: This site is built with Hugo. Hugo is written in Go and is one of the most popular open-source static site generators. Hugo allows you to create a rich static site easily. You don’t have to be a professional front-end web developer or an experienced Go programmer. All you have to do is edit a toml file and write your posts as a markdown format.

item.title: Comparing two JSONs with float values in Python
item.description: JSON objects are often used while we write programs. I will introduce the way to compare two JSONs with float values for approximate equality in Python.
